text: [Music]
hey everyone this is Dory I'm a teacher
of English and today I'm going to show
you the strategy and plan you need to
follow in order to write a letter in I
El's General task one okay first of all
let's take a task as an
example okay let's read our task you
have seen an advertisement in the
newspaper for a job work working as a
receptionist in a big hotel during the
summer season you decide to apply for
the job write a letter to the manager of
the hotel in your letter introduce
yourself explain what former experience
and skills you have in relation to the
position explain why you're interested
in the job write at least 150 words you
do not need to write any addresses okay
this is your task it is obviously a
formal letter firstly you have to begin
your letter with dear if you don't know
the person's name you're writing to then
you will write Dear Sir or Madam like
here after that things are pretty simple
you don't need to feel anxious or
confused about this task simply you will
use one paragraph for each of these
points over here so one paragraph for
this one one second paragraph for this
one and one last paragraph for your
third
point so let's read our first Point
again introduce yourself so in your
first paragraph you will introduce
yourself and of course you will state
the reason okay so let's
see Dear Sir Madam I'm writing to apply
for the receptionist summer job in your
hotel which was recently advertised in
the newspaper so as you can see you
immediately State the reason moving on I
am 23 years old and I have graduated
from the West London College where I
have studied hotel and tourism
management and now you actually
introduce yourself all
right as you can see you will have to
make some things up but it won't be
difficult just use the information
you're given and your imagination the
important thing is your grammar also
notice that I didn't use
contractions I used I am writing instead
of I'm I am 23 years old instead of I'm
again and I have studied I have
graduated instead of I've studied I've
graduated okay also this since this is a
formal letter please as a whole prefer
the pass voice for example which was
recently advertised
okay now accordingly you will write one
paragraph for the second Point let's
read it explain what former experience
and skills you have in relation to the
position so you will talk about your
former experience and skills and then
your last paragraph is going to be about
the third Point explain why you're
interested in the job
lastly you're going to close your letter
with these phrase over here I'm looking
forward to hearing from you please note
that this is a standard expression we
learn it as is
so don't be confused by the fact that
there is an ing here after two all right
this is how it goes I'm looking forward
to hearing from you Yours Faithfully and
then your name and surname your name and
last name you should put
both please note that when you know the
person's name that you're writing to it
is not for example Dear Sir Madam you
know the name it is uh let's just say
Dear Mr Jones then you will end your
letter with yours sincerely instead of
Yours
Faithfully and of course your name but
if you do not know the name
you will write as we've seen Dear Sir
Madam and Yours Faithfully and your name
both both your name and your s name okay
that's it now you just need to improve
your grammar uh syntax vocabulary and
please your spelling if you want to read
the rest of the letter you can do it
here in this
link okay that's it for today thank you
very much for watching I hope it helps
if this is your first time here would
like to see you subscribe for more
